trans-unit.source: Provides methods for writing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects to XML Paper Specification (XPS) documents or to a print queue in batch mode.
trans-unit.target: Specifica i metodi per la scrittura di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in documenti XPS (XML Paper Specification) o in una coda di stampa in modalità batch.

trans-unit.source: Because this class has no constructor, use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> method to create an instance.
trans-unit.target: Poiché questa classe non ha costruttore, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> metodo per creare un'istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> scrive alla stessa destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> come il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> che crea il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> becomes a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> diventa una pagina nel documento.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a visuals collator and use it to write to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare un'utilità di confronto di oggetti visivi e usarlo per scrivere un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that write operations can begin.
trans-unit.target: Indica che le operazioni di scrittura possono iniziare.

trans-unit.source: You must call this method before you call any <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Write%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.WriteAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: È necessario chiamare questo metodo prima di chiamare qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Write%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.WriteAsync%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: After the last write operation, call <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.EndBatchWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Dopo l'ultima operazione di scrittura, chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.EndBatchWrite%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Cancels a synchronous writing operation.
trans-unit.target: Annulla un'operazione di scrittura sincrona.

trans-unit.source: For example, an exception is thrown if the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Cancel%2A> method is called and a writing operation is not in progress.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, viene generata un'eccezione se il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Cancel%2A> metodo viene chiamato e non è in corso un'operazione di scrittura.

trans-unit.source: The state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> is not compatible with a <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Cancel" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> non è compatibile con un'operazione <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Cancel" />.

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous writing operation.
trans-unit.target: Annulla un'operazione di scrittura asincrona.

trans-unit.source: For example, an exception is thrown if the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.CancelAsync%2A> method is called and a writing operation is not in progress.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, viene generata un'eccezione se il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.CancelAsync%2A> metodo viene chiamato e non è in corso un'operazione di scrittura.

trans-unit.source: The state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> is not compatible with a <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.CancelAsync" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> non è compatibile con un'operazione <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.CancelAsync" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that write operations must end.
trans-unit.target: Indica che le operazioni di scrittura devono terminare.

trans-unit.source: After the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Write%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.WriteAsync%2A>, call this method.
trans-unit.target: Dopo l'ultima chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.Write%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.WriteAsync%2A>, chiamare questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.BeginBatchWrite%2A> before any write operations.
trans-unit.target: È necessario chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument.BeginBatchWrite%2A> prima che le operazioni di scrittura.

trans-unit.source: Writes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />synchronously to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> scritto.

trans-unit.source: Writes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> synchronously to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to write to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare questo metodo per scrivere un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> scritto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents the default printing preferences for the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> che rappresenta le preferenze di stampa predefinite per il documento.

trans-unit.source: Writes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> synchronously to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> and includes a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> includendo <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non convalida né modifica l'oggetto specificato `printTicket` per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> specifico di <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> ed è valido per una stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: Writes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />asynchronously to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo asincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> scritto.

trans-unit.source: Writes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> asynchronously to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo asincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> scritto.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data that the caller wants to pass to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted" /> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto contenente i dati che il chiamante vuole passare al gestore eventi <see cref="E:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> asynchronously to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> and includes additional information that the caller wants to pass to an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Scrive un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in modo asincrono in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> e include le informazioni aggiuntive che il chiamante vuole passare a un gestore eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> scritto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents the default printing preferences for the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> che rappresenta le preferenze di stampa predefinite per il documento.

trans-unit.source: Writes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> asynchronously to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> and includes a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo asincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> includendo <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non convalida né modifica l'oggetto specificato `printTicket` per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> specifico di <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> ed è valido per una stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> scritto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents the default printing preferences for the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> che rappresenta le preferenze di stampa predefinite per il documento.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the data that the caller wants to pass to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted" /> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene i dati che il chiamante vuole passare al gestore eventi <see cref="E:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> asynchronously to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />; also includes a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> and any additional information that the caller wants to pass to an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo asincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> e include un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> ed eventuali informazioni aggiuntive che il chiamante vuole passare a un gestore eventi.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non convalida né modifica l'oggetto specificato `printTicket` per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> specifico di <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> ed è valido per una stampante specificata.
